bill_title: Honoring Teresa Johnson of Pierre as the Region IV Correctional Education Association Teacher of the Year.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Teresa Johnson of Pierre as the Region IV Correctional Education Association Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Teresa Johnson, a lead worker and instructor at the South Dakota Women's Prison in Pierre, was chosen as the 2003 Region IV Correctional Education Association Teacher of the Year; and WHEREAS, Mrs. Johnson helps prepare numerous inmates for their General Education Development exams and administers Tests of Adult Basic Education; and WHEREAS, Mrs. Johnson also assists with the rehabilitation of inmates by teaching classes on subjects including corrective thinking, anger and stress management, and the impact of crime on victims: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Teresa Johnson be congratulated upon her selection as 2003 Region IV Correctional Education Association Teacher of the Year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Teresa Johnson of Pierre as the Region IV Correctional Education Association Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Teresa Johnson, a lead worker and instructor at the South Dakota Women's Prison in Pierre, was chosen as the 2003 Region IV Correctional Education Association Teacher of the Year; and WHEREAS, Mrs. Johnson helps prepare numerous inmates for their General Education Development exams and administers Tests of Adult Basic Education; and WHEREAS, Mrs. Johnson also assists with the rehabilitation of inmates by teaching classes on subjects including corrective thinking, anger and stress management, and the impact of crime on victims: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Teresa Johnson be congratulated upon her selection as 2003 Region IV Correctional Education Association Teacher of the Year.
